Sniper


Sniper walks up toward the Predacon base. He yells, "Hell Beast you 
are pathetic, can't even Destroy a mmaximal base like you used to. 
Slag, I bet you can't even Defeat Me. I could defeat you Easly
though, 
So you want to take me on or do you want to so your troops how much
of 
a coward you are." Sniper pulls out a Rifle and waits for a Response.
